Package breakthroughPP.gui

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Showable
    This interface provides the possibility to show a Board
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameButton
    Buttons which are placed on the board.
    GridPanel
    This is the main panel for the game gui.
    InfoMovePanel
    The western panel which shows a list of moves made in the past.
    InfoPanel
    This class provides a JPanel which prints information to the user.
    MainFrame
    This class provides a gui to show the game.
    MyGlassPane
    Glass pane which can paint over other JComponents of a gui.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    VisualisationException
    A VisualisationException indicates that visualisation of the game state failed.
